trans-unit.source: Represents the core properties of a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the category of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.

The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.Category%2A> value is typically used as part of the application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] to create labels for navigation controls.
The category of the content that is contained in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the status of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
Example <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.ContentStatus%2A> values include "Draft", "Reviewed", and "Final".
The status of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> content.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the type of content that is contained in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
Example <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.ContentType%2A> values include "Whitepaper", "Security Bulletin", and "Exam".
This <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.ContentType%2A> property is distinct from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] content types as defined in RFC 2616.
The type of content that is contained in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the date and time the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> was created.
The date and time the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> was initially created.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that identifies the individual or entity that created the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and its content.
The individual or entity that created the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and its content.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a description of the content contained in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.

The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.Description%2A> may include but is not limited to: an abstract, table of contents, reference to a graphical representation of content, or a free-text account of the content.
A description of the content contained in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"></xref> instance.
Call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties>.
The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> in an unusable state.

After calling <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> was occupying.

For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
Always call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> object's `Finalize` method.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"></xref> instance and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
`true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that unambiguously identifies the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and its content.
A value that unambiguously identifies the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and its content.

When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that define a delimited set of keywords to support searching and indexing the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and its content.
The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.Keywords%2A> property typically contains a list of terms that are not available elsewhere in <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties>.
A delimited set of keywords to support searching and indexing the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and content.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that identifies the language of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> content.
A value that identifies the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> content language.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that identifies the user who last modified the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> content.
The user who last modified the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> content.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the date and time the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> content was last printed.
The date and time the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> content was last printed.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the date and time the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> was last changed.
The date and time the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> was last changed.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the revision number of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.Revision%2A> property indicates the number of changed saves or revisions.
The application is responsible for updating the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties.Revision%2A> property value after each revision.
The revision number of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the topic of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> content.
The topic of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> content.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the name given to the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and its content.
The name given to the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and its content.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the version number of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
The version number of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
